Azure Active Directory

Synchronize on-premises directories and enable single sign-on

1RMB Trial Buy Now

Azure Active Directory is a comprehensive and highly available identification and access control cloud solution. It combines core directory services,advanced identity governance and application access management. Azure Active Directory also provides a standards-based platform with abundant functions which supports developers in providing access control for applications based on centralized policies and rules.

Azure Active Directory currently provides a free level. For details on the list of features, please see the table below.

The Free edition of Azure Active Directory covers cloud application access and self-service identify management of task owners with cloud priority requirements.
